name: Bubble Star Plus: BubblePop!
description:
This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble buster game.
Enjoy this classic, fun bubble shooter game with 1000+ awesome puzzle levels!

Shoot, pop and explode all the bubbles and enjoy this amazing stress relief game anytime you want.
With plenty of amazing puzzles and challenges, cool boosters and effects, you simply won’t put it down!

The best shoot-bubble style game!
SHOOT and POP the colored balls in this fun, addicting puzzle game and master all the challenges!
If you are looking for a fun way to spend time, we have a perfect game for you.

Much more interesting levels are coming soon!

KEY FEATURES
* Over 1000 puzzles filled with fun and amazing challenges!
* Super easy to learn yet challenging for the brain.
* No need for WiFi. Enjoy the game offline!
* Fun for all ages and gender!
* Really addicting to play and helps relaxing your brain and finger!
* Classic Bubble Blast and uniquely challenging obstacles.
* You will have many levels and unique features that make it better then the other puzzle game.
* You don’t just burst bubbles and finish the level, here you have very special levels design and unique ball mechanic that will keep you playing for long time.
* This will keep you playing for long time with many unique levels.
* Hundreds of exciting levels in a colorful setting!

HOW TO PLAY
* Just Aim and shoot the bubble!
* Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color as the bubble.
* If you match consecutively, you can get higher score. Get 3 stars.
* Use fewer shots to get higher scores.
* Unlock powerful boosters to help you blast through hard levels.
* Drop bubbles to get booster items and clear levels more easily.
* Clear all the bubbles on the screen.
* Swap the bubbles to match & pop more.

NOTES
* This contains some ads which are banners, interstitials and videos ads.
* This is free to play game, but some in-app purchases are included.
* It’s a free puzzle tactic game with no time limit.

Match the colorful bubbles to pop and blast large groups and clear the screen.
Play today and discover amazing graphics, cool features, and exciting bubble puzzles.
The bubble shooting fun starts NOW!

Thank you!
